data_table.description: The dataset represents variables used to assess the ability of volunteers to perform the tasks (e.g. testing urine and blood for glucose content several times/day, administering insulin [via injection, pump etc.], following a prescribed diet) required of them as DCCT participants. The information was obtained at eligibility screening (see also pht000217, form 57).

variable.name: FSASDATE
variable.description: Form date as SAS date value

variable.name: FORM
variable.description: DCCT form number

variable.name: EFB1A1
variable.description: Patient's performance rating: task 1 - draw 9 U of insulin in 0.5cc syringe, trial 1

variable.name: EFB1A2
variable.description: Patient's performance rating: task 1 - draw 9 U of insulin in 0.5cc syringe, trial 2

variable.name: EFB1B1
variable.description: Patient's performance rating: task 2 - draw 16 U of insulin in 1cc syringe, trial 1

variable.name: EFB1B2
variable.description: Patient's performance rating: task 2 - draw 16 U of insulin in 1cc syringe, trial 2

variable.name: EFB1C1
variable.description: Patient's performance rating: task 3 - mix 14 U of insulin with 6 U of insulin, trial 1

variable.name: EFB1C2
variable.description: Patient's performance rating: task 3 - mix 14 U of insulin with 6 U of insulin, trial 2

variable.name: EFB1D11
variable.description: Patient's performance rating: task 4 - test urine glucose - Clinitest, trial 1

variable.name: EFB1D12
variable.description: Patient's performance rating: task 4 - test urine glucose - Clinitest, trial 2

variable.name: EFB1D21
variable.description: Patient's performance rating: task 4 - test urine glucose - Diastik, trial 1

variable.name: EFB1D22
variable.description: Patient's performance rating: task 4 - test urine glucose - Diastik, trial 2

variable.description: Patient's performance rating: task 4 - test urine glucose -Testape, trial 1

variable.name: EFB1D32
variable.description: Patient's performance rating: task 4 - test urine glucose -Testape, trial 2

variable.name: EFB1E1
variable.description: Patient's performance rating: task 5 - collect capillary blood, trial 1

variable.name: EFB1E2
variable.description: Patient's performance rating: task 5 - collect capillary blood, trial 2

variable.name: EFB21
variable.description: Patient's performance rating: task 6 - symptom matching, trial 1

variable.name: EFB22
variable.description: Patient's performance rating: task 6 - symptom matching, trial 2

variable.name: EFB3A1
variable.description: Patient's performance rating: task 7- person w/IDDM develops symptoms and should: leave game, trial 1

variable.name: EFB3A2
variable.description: Patient's performance rating: task 7- person w/IDDM develops symptoms and should: leave game, trial 2

variable.name: EFB3B1
variable.description: Patient's performance rating: task 7- person w/IDDM develops symptoms and should: take simple carbohydrates, trial 1

variable.name: EFB3B2
variable.description: Patient's performance rating: task 7- person w/IDDM develops symptoms and should: take simple carbohydrates, trial 2

variable.name: EFB3C2
variable.description: Patient's performance rating: task 7- person w/IDDM develops symptoms and should: check blood sugar, trial 2

variable.name: EFB3D1
variable.description: Patient's performance rating: task 7- person w/IDDM develops symptoms and should: undertake other action, trial 1

variable.name: EFB3D2
variable.description: Patient's performance rating: task 7- person w/IDDM develops symptoms and should: undertake other action, trial 2

variable.name: EFB4A1
variable.description: Patient's performance rating: task 8 - identify common causes of ketoacidosis: failure to take insulin, trial 1

variable.name: EFB4A2
variable.description: Patient's performance rating: task 8 - identify common causes of ketoacidosis: failure to take insulin, trial 2

variable.description: Patient's performance rating: task 8 - identify common causes of ketoacidosis: infection, trial 1

variable.name: EFB4B2
variable.description: Patient's performance rating: task 8 - identify common causes of ketoacidosis: infection, trial 2
